summary: Cosette is cursed. Demons Ghouls and Ghosts from the darkest corners of Hell are summoned to bring her to the other side. Now Cosette and Klaus her protector must face an unspeakable evil in an attempt to free her from this demonic curse.
cast: Robert Amstler|Jenny Allford|Raven Lexy|Gabriel Kalomas|James Edward Tolbert|Mattia Borrani|Andrew Boetjer|Nicklaus Haughian|George Anderson|Matthew Sydney|Thomas Falzarano|Pete Sprouse|Cheryl McIntire|Sean McIntire|Pat McIntire|Frank Verbeck|Amber Parker|Joy Mittry|Tony Altstatt|Rene Perez|Alfred Martinez Jr.|Michael Hillebrand|Remi Elkhatib|Greg Ruddy|Jay Bruce|David Donahoo|Patrick White|Keith Lack|Salomon Gonzalez|Harry Bruce|Rashall Miller|Sandy Palhegyi|Steve Palhegyi|Jenia Willhite|Dave Sawyer|Elisha Bundesen|Andreas Abramson|Amber Anderson|Tracy Boss|Greg Dahler|Tim Johnson|James R. Martinez|Marlinda Russo|Pete Stravrianduakis|Roger H. Dunn Jr.
title: Demon Hunter
